sentence: Show me all kiosks not further away than 100m from a park in Berlin
model_result:
area:
  - name: Berlin
entities:
  - name: Kiosk
    id: 1
    features:
      - name: location
        value: [kiosk location]
      - name: type
        value: [kiosk type]
  - name: Park
    id: 2
    properties:
      - name: name
        value: [park name]
      - name: location
        value: [park location]
relations:
  - source: 1
    target: 2
    relation: near
    distance: 100m
